input_text:
Job Title: Paid Search Planner

Location: Louisville Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Marketing, Public Relations

Description:
Paid Search Planner/Buyer (Louisville, KY or Columbus, OH)
Doe-Anderson is looking for a Paid Search Planner/Buyer to join the dynamic media team. The primary goal of this position is to plan, implement and manage client paid search (SEM) campaigns. The job entails being strategic, administrative and collaborative. The individual must enjoy working with others and be able to work effectively with details, deadlines and change.
Primary Duties and Responsibilities
• Collaborate with other SEM Planner/Buyer to split client assignments and provide backup on non-assigned accounts when needed.• Work directly with Client Partnership and Media team members to understand campaign objectives and how they relate to prospect search behavior.• Use this knowledge to create recommended paid search campaigns.• Build and implement search campaigns within Google Ads and Microsoft Ads platforms from the ground-up.• Work closely with the Analytics and Ad Ops teams to implement proper tracking.• Regularly monitor and optimize assigned search campaigns within platforms based on delivery and performance.• Work with Media and Analytics team members to contribute to monthly and annual campaign reports and insights.• Be comfortable in team and client settings for both informal meetings and presentations.• Stay up-to-date on platform changes, industry trends and new tools. Share information with internal teams as needed.
Requirements
• Two+ years of paid search (SEM) experience preferred.• Proficiency in paid search platforms, such as Google Ads and Microsoft Ads• Experience in budget planning and management, in relation to advertising• Strong presentation skills• Google Ads Certification a plus
Qualified individuals may submit their credentials to hr@doeanderson.com
About Louisville:Our hometown since 1915 was recently dubbed “the new Austin.” We’re not sure what that means, but we’ll take it as a compliment. We like to think of Louisville as the place where Southern hospitality begins but Midwestern common sense and practicality stick around. It’s a blend of the best of both cultures. And speaking of culture, we’ve long been known for having one of the country’s most dynamic art scenes. Over the past decade, our food scene has caught up, with Louisville becoming recognized as one of the leaders in the farm-to-table movement. Oh, and did we mention bourbon? Mix in with a low cost of living and an ease of getting around. Stir well. Enjoy.
About Columbus:Buckeyes. Bridges. And beer hotels. These are just a few of the things that make our second home, Columbus, Ohio, one of America’s most engaging cities. Home to both the state capital and one of the country’s most storied public universities, Columbus offers a dynamic blend of youthful energy, progressive spirit, and good old-fashioned Midwestern attitude (or lack thereof). Even The New York Times was duly impressed, recently naming Columbus one of their “52 Places to Go” around the world. Our local outpost is smack dab in the middle of the Short North, one of the many vibrant neighborhoods within a few minutes of downtown. We encourage you to come pay us a visit; wearing scarlet and gray is optional.
About Doe-Anderson:You know the cliché about a company being “like a family?” Well, sometimes clichés become clichés because they’re true. In the case of Doe-Anderson, you would be joining an organization that’s been nurturing careers (and the people attached to them) for well over a century. We like to think it’s because you can carve your own path here, supported by management and your peers. We try hard to keep the corporate politics to a minimum and the self-reliance to the max. That may be why almost half our employees are shareholders in the company – and why people tend to stick around nearly three times the ad agency average. There’s something about the place that makes it hard to leave.
At Doe-Anderson, we have a long history of creating work that, well, works. To do this, we strive to reflect the world we live in and speak to every day. Building belief in brands begins with believing in and celebrating one another as individual members of a diverse and inclusive team.
We will never disqualify a potential team member based on race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin or veteran or disability status.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Paid Search Planner
output_json.summary: Paid Search Planner/Buyer to join the dynamic media team.

Build and implement search campaigns within Google Ads and Microsoft Ads platforms
Monitor and optimize assigned search campaigns
Contribute to monthly and annual campaign reports
Stay updated on platform changes and industry trends
output_json.company_information: Doe-Anderson is a company that has been nurturing careers for over a century. It's known for its supportive environment, minimal corporate politics, and high retention rate among employees.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We will never disqualify a potential team member based on race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin or veteran or disability status.

other.content: Louisville is known for its Southern hospitality, Midwestern common sense, dynamic art scene, farm-to-table movement, and bourbon.
Columbus is a city with youthful energy, a progressive spirit, and a Midwestern attitude. It's recognized as one of the leaders in the farm-to-table movement and has a low cost of living.
Doe-Anderson is an organization that supports career development and diversity. Almost half of its employees are shareholders, and it has a high retention rate compared to the ad agency average.
